Class Wall

  • java.lang.Object
    • Wall
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Particle, Racer
    public class Wall
extends java.lang.Object
    A colored rectangle expressed with position and size, used primarily for collision detection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Wall​(GeoVector pos, double size)
      Constructs a black wall with position and size.
      Wall​(GeoVector pos, double size, java.awt.Color color)
      Constructs a wall with position, size and color.
